title: How to Make Peanut Cookies

steps.headline: Pre-heat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Get a large bowl and add the white sugar, egg, milk, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, and oil.
steps.description: Mix everything together with a wooden spoon until you get a brown paste as a result.

steps.headline: Pour in the grounded peanut pieces and mix them in well into the mixture with your hands for about a minute.
steps.description: Try not to overdo the mixing because then the dough will become tough, which you don't want to get.

steps.headline: Grab a small amount of dough and roll it into a small ball with your palm.
Put the dough balls onto a baking tray, leaving a good inch or two apart.
steps.description: The spacing leaves enough room so that the dough can expand without spreading into another cookie while it's cooking.

steps.headline: Take your thumb and lightly press down on each ball to slightly flatten them out.
Place the baking tray in the oven and bake the cookies for about 20 to 25 minutes.
Remove the cookies from the oven after baked.
steps.description: Lightly sprinkle powdered sugar onto the cookies while they're still hot. Put the cookies on a cooling rack and set aside to cool down before serving.

text: Pre-heat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).  Get a large bowl and add the white sugar, egg, milk, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, and oil. Mix everything together with a wooden spoon until you get a brown paste as a result. Pour in the grounded peanut pieces and mix them in well into the mixture with your hands for about a minute. Try not to overdo the mixing because then the dough will become tough, which you don't want to get. Grab a small amount of dough and roll it into a small ball with your palm.  Put the dough balls onto a baking tray, leaving a good inch or two apart. The spacing leaves enough room so that the dough can expand without spreading into another cookie while it's cooking. Take your thumb and lightly press down on each ball to slightly flatten them out.  Place the baking tray in the oven and bake the cookies for about 20 to 25 minutes.  Remove the cookies from the oven after baked. Lightly sprinkle powdered sugar onto the cookies while they're still hot. Put the cookies on a cooling rack and set aside to cool down before serving. Finished.
